alert.note: Alert for Macomb; Oakland; Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 6:32PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF MACOMB...OAKLAND...AND WAYNE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of 20 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 632 PM EST, a snow squall was along a line extending from near Harsens Island to Warren to Southfield and moving southeast at 10 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Warren, Troy, Southfield, St. Clair Shores, Sterling Heights, Royal Oak, Clinton, and Detroit Zoo around 635 PM EST. Grosse Pointe around 700 PM EST. This includes the following highways... I-75 between mile markers 55 and 65. I-94 between mile markers 218 and 238. I-696 between mile markers 11 and 28. M-10 between mile markers 7 and 8, and between mile markers 11 and 18. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
